contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox MLB player |name=Eduardo Zambrano |image= |caption= |position=[[Outfielder]] |bats=Right |throws=Right |birth_date={{birth date and age|1966|2|1}} |birth_place=[[Maracaibo, Venezuela]] |debutdate=September 19 |debutyear={{by|1993}} |debutteam=[[Chicago Cubs]] |finaldate=August 10 |finalyear={{by|1994}} |finalteam=[[Chicago Cubs]] |stat1label=[[Batting average]] |stat1value=.263 |stat2label=[[Home run]]s |stat2value=6 |stat3label=[[Run batted in|Runs batted in]] |stat3value=20 |teams=<nowiki></nowiki> * [[Chicago Cubs]] (1993–1994) |highlights=<nowiki></nowiki> * [[American Association (20th century)|American Association]] MVP, 1993 }} '''Eduardo José Zambrano''' (born February 1, 1966 in [[Zulia State|Maracaibo]], [[Venezuela]]) is a former [[professional baseball]] player. He played parts of two [[Major League Baseball]] seasons for the [[Chicago Cubs]] (1993-94), playing four different positions. He batted and threw right-handed. He was the [[American Association (20th century)|American Association]] MVP in 1993, leading the league with 32 [[home run]]s and 115 [[runs batted in]]. In the majors, Zambrano was a career .263 hitter (35-133), with six [[home run]]s, 20 [[Run batted in|RBI]], 18 [[Run (baseball)|runs]], seven [[Double (baseball)|doubles]], and two [[stolen base]]s in 75 games. ==See also== * [[List of players from Venezuela in Major League Baseball|Players from Venezuela in MLB]] ==External links== *{{baseballstats | br=z/zambred01 | brm=zambra001edu}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Zambrano, Eduardo | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Venezuelan baseball player | DATE OF BIRTH = February 1, 1966 | PLACE OF BIRTH = [[Maracaibo, Venezuela]] | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Zambrano, Eduardo}} [[Category:Major League Baseball outfielders]] [[Category:Chicago Cubs players]] [[Category:Greensboro Hornets players]] [[Category:Winter Haven Red Sox players]] [[Category:New Britain Red Sox players]] [[Category:Kinston Indians players]] [[Category:Carolina Mudcats players]] [[Category:Buffalo Bisons (minor league) players]] [[Category:Iowa Cubs players]] [[Category:Gulf Coast Red Sox players]] [[Category:Trenton Thunder players]] [[Category:Pawtucket Red Sox players]] [[Category:Rieleros de Aguascalientes players]] [[Category:Langosteros de Cancún players]] [[Category:Major League Baseball players from Venezuela]] [[Category:People from Maracaibo]] [[Category:1966 births]] [[Category:Living people]] {{Venezuela-baseball-outfielder-stub}}
